document.full_text: mr. rose, the producer of shows like 'a raisin in the sun' and 'purlie victorious,' advanced the cause of black playwrights and actors and helped widen the scope of american theater.
document.title: philip rose, 'raisin' and 'purlie' producer, dies at 89
